benchmark_details.name: AIvaluateXR
benchmark_details.overview: AIvaluateXR is a comprehensive evaluation framework for benchmarking large language models (LLMs) running on extended reality (XR) devices. It provides guidelines and standard metrics for performance evaluation across various model-device pairs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a structured framework for evaluating and optimizing the performance of LLMs on XR devices.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Limited to evaluating LLMs on XR devices primarily using CPU due to GPU memory restrictions.

data.source: Hugging Face model repository and customized testing scripts.
data.annotation: Automatically generated prompts for uniform testing.

methodology.calculation: Performance metrics are calculated based on repeated experimental runs and averaged for accuracy.
methodology.interpretation: Higher processing speeds and consistent performance indicate more optimal model-device pairings.
methodology.validation: Results validated through multiple runs and comparison against established benchmarks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: No personally identifiable information is collected during testing.
